item.title: Beam Pattern: Calling External Services Using Retrofit For Data Enrichment
item.description: Background For the past two months, me and my team had deployed pipeline using Apache Beam in production environment. The pipeline step is very simple just filter data by event, enrich data by user id, then insert to BigQuery.
